title: Did Mr. Mitch McConnell increase the value of his network by approximately $2.4 million each year for a contract?
subtitle: The Mimi programme, based on an announcement of the 2014 campaign, continued to make online tours years later.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Senator Mitch McConnell increased his net value by $2.4 million each year for a decade while in office.
